itemincludesprecisiondesign8sd2microsdme: Precision Design Memory Card Case Secure your memory cards and protect your digital photos. itemincludes1yearsubscriptiontooutdoorph: 1-Year Subscription to Outdoor Photography Magazine Your #1 Guide for Better Outdoor Photography is the premier magazine about outdoor photography. A one-year subscription is included as part of your purchase... that's Outdoor Photographer 11 issues packed with valuable tips, tricks and news about nature photography, conveniently delivered to your door! A prepaid Subscription Voucher Card will be included with your order, which will activate your subscription when mailed to Outdoor Photography. The first of your eleven issues will then be sent to your address (USA and Canadian addresses only) in about 10 weeks. One subscription per household. Outdoor Photography's technique articles are geared to helping you capture the best wildlife, travel and outdoor sports photography. Review photography tips and keep up with digital photography as applied to nature photography, and stay current with the latest in photography equipment. You can also explore readers' favorite places that offer the best in photography locations.
